alert.note: Alert for Kent; Queen Anne's (Maryland) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly (New Jersey, Delaware, Southeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 14 at 3:23PM EST until December 15 at 9:00AM EST by NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 5 AM TO 9 AM EST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Freezing rain expected. Total ice accumulations of a light glaze. * WHERE...Kent MD and Queen Annes. * WHEN...From 5 AM to 9 AM EST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Very slippery sidewalks, roads, and bridges are possible. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Precipitation will begin as freezing rain in the predawn hours, perhaps mixing with snow or sleet at onset. Temperatures will warm above freezing by mid-morning resulting in a change to plain rain.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Prepare for possible power outages. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
